entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
